amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used by the Department of Transportation to promulgate regulations based on race, ethnicity, or sex.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used by the Department of Transportation to promulgate regulations based on race, ethnicity, or sex.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
